long_description: The Sorbothane 3/4-Length Rigid Arch Insoles provide the most aggressive arch support in the Sorbothane line of insoles, offering maximum stride-correcting stability with any shoes' existing insoles. Wear the Sorbothane 3/4-Length Rigid Arch Insoles with dress, casual or athletic shoes. Rigid Arch insoles provide excellent shock absorbtion and foot-strike protection to help prevent fatigue and injuries. Rigid polypropylene plate lifts and holds foot, adding significant arch support and stability. Heel insert absorbs up to 94.7% of impact shock, reducing impact-related injuries, jarring, fatigue and pain, while adding comfort. Non-slip, antifungal foam layer cushions and rebounds to original shape; brushed polyester fabric top adds comfort and extra moisture wicking. Overstock.
short_description: The Sorbothane 3/4-Length Rigid Arch Insoles provide the most aggressive arch support in the Sorbothane line of insoles, offering maximum stride-correcting stability with any shoes' existing insoles.
